price: 11 Mais s’ils se repentent, accomplissent la prière et s’acquittent de l’aumône, ils deviendront vos frères par la foi. Nous exposons clairement Nos enseignements à des gens capables de les comprendre.
arabic: فَإِن تَابُواْ وَأَقَامُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتَوُاْ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ فَإِخۡوَٰنُكُمۡ فِي ٱلدِّينِۗ وَنُفَصِّلُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لِقَوۡمٖ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: fa-in tābū wa-aqāmū al-ṣalata waātawū al-zakata fa-ikh'wānukum fī al-dīni wanufaṣṣilu al-āyāti liqawmin yaʿlamūna
